welcome.description: <bold>Product-focused Full-Stack Developer</bold> with <bold>2+ years of experience</bold> delivering robust, scalable software solutions across <bold>frontend, backend, mobile in BIM and IoT domains.</bold> Specialized in <bold>Java Spring Boot, React, Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL</bold>. Adept at architecting <bold>multi-tenant SaaS platforms, real-time systems, and payment integrations.</bold> Combines strong engineering fundamentals with <bold>creative problem-solving</bold> and a <bold>clean, systematic coding approach.</bold>
